ReadableStreamBYOBReaderCancel.summary:
The cancel() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves when the stream is canceled.
Calling this method signals a loss of interest in the stream by a consumer.

blockquote.para: Note: If the reader is active, the cancel() method behaves the same as that for the associated stream ().

ReadableStreamBYOBReaderCancel.returns: A , which fulfills with the value given in the reason parameter.
